metadata.title: CVE-2020-6630 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function gf_isom_get_media_data_size() in isomedia/isom_read.c.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
